      • Counter

        public Counter(javafx.scene.control.Label timeLabelP,
               int delay,
               LivetickerViewController controller,
               int endMinutes,
               int oddsA)
        Initializes the counter with the provided values
        Parameters:
        timeLabelP - reference the the label to change (timelabel)
        delay - the delay between the cicles = speed
        controller - a reference to the controller
        endMinutes - after how many minutes the match should end = when the endofmatchview opens
        oddsA - the odds of team A
